heading: Thursday Night
text: Mountain snow showers, scattered northern valleys, clouds south.

heading: Friday
text: Scattered snow showers, mainly northern mountains.
temperature: Lower 30s to lower 40s, north to south

heading: Saturday
text: Partly cloudy; chance of late-day rain or snow in New York.
temperature: Lower 30s to lower 40s, north to south

heading: Sunday
text: A wintry mix changing to rain and snow.
temperature: Low to mid 40s, with 30s northeast, and upper 40s far south
